SEARCH
Package Tekiz._DPSCalculator._DPSCalculator.services.parser

Class ParsingService

java.lang.Object
Tekiz._DPSCalculator._DPSCalculator.services.parser.ParsingService
@Service public class ParsingService extends Object
A service responsible for parsing and evaluating SpEL (Spring Expression Language) expressions. in the context of a player's loadout. It manages the context setup, expression parsing, and expression evaluation.

This service interacts with the LoadoutManager to retrieve the current loadout of a user and manages the evaluation context for expressions. It can parse both Expression objects and string-based expressions.

      The constructor for a ParsingService object.
      Parameters:
      parser - The SpEL ExpressionParser used for parsing string expressions.
      loadoutManager - The LoadoutManager used to retrieve the current loadout.
      applicationContext - The Spring ApplicationContext for resolving beans.

  • Method Details

    • getCurrentLoadout

      public Loadout getCurrentLoadout()
      A method that retrieves the loadout currently in use.
      Returns:
      The loadout to be used.

    • getContext

      public org.springframework.expression.spel.support.StandardEvaluationContext getContext(Object rootObject)
      A method prepares a StandardEvaluationContext with applied contextual information for Expression evaluations.
      Parameters:
      rootObject - The root object for the evaluation context, or null if no root is needed.
      Returns:
      The configured StandardEvaluationContext for SpEL evaluations.

    • parseString

      public org.springframework.expression.Expression parseString(String expressionString)
      A method used to parse String based expressions.
      Parameters:
      expressionString - The String based on expression.
      Returns:
      A parsed Expression object based on the expressionString.

    • parseContext

      public Map.Entry<ModifierTypes,Number> parseContext(org.springframework.expression.Expression expression)
      Evaluates a given SpEL Expression in the context of the player's current loadout, and returns the result as a Map.Entry of ModifierTypes and Number.
      Parameters:
      expression - The SpEL Expression to evaluate.
      Returns:
      The result of the expression evaluation as a Map.Entry, or null if evaluation fails.

    • evaluateCondition

      public Boolean evaluateCondition(Object rootObject, org.springframework.expression.Expression condition)
      Evaluates a given SpEL Expression as a boolean condition in the context of the provided root object. Used to determine if a Modifier effects should be applied.
      Parameters:
      rootObject - The root object for the evaluation context.
      condition - The SpEL Expression of the condition to evaluate.
      Returns:
      true if the condition evaluates to true, false otherwise.
